LaunchVPS – 512MB KVM VPS from $5.95/quarter plus other options from Philadelphia, PA Datacenter!

kvm, launchvps.com, philadelphia July 11, 2020 @ 8:24 am, by Jon Biloh

LaunchVPS is back with a new exclusive offer for LowEndBox after a few years! They were last featured in May 2017, over two years ago.  Overall LaunchVPS has been featured a handful of times since 2016, so they aren’t new around here. Today’s offer is for three different packages between 512MB RAM 3GB RAM KVM VPS hosted at their Philadelphia datacenter location. 

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their legal documents here. They accept PayPal, all major credit cards, and Bitcoin.

In their own words: 

“LaunchVPS offers performance optimized SSD virtual servers and web hosting solutions. Founded in 2014 and based in the Philadelphia suburbs, we strive to build and support high quality, cost-effective hosting solutions for our customers. We have over a decade of experience in the hosting industry in the field of virtualization, cloud, and application hosting.

In addition to high-quality infrastructure, we have a distinct passion for assisting and enabling our customers. Our main objective is to offer a solid foundation, very flexible options, and incredibly helpful support. We feel this combines to offer our customers a superior experience which benefits their relationship to their end-users and clients.

We own our server and network hardware running in a secure Philadelphia datacenter consisting of Supermicro servers packed with fast ECC RAM, SSDs in ZFS RAID for ~1Gbps I/O, hexa-core Intel CPUs, and A+B power all linked to our multi-homed BGP redundant network. Additionally, our single inclusive control panel is fully functional including an HTML5 console, power options, boot options, snapshots, backups, template & ISO library, and usage graphs.

We want to make it easy for the LEB community to get started with our robust hardware platform, reliable network, and easy to use management features by offering special prices on the following exclusive KVM plans! There is nothing to lose with our 45-day no questions asked refund!”

Here are the offers:

512MB KVM VPS

  • 512 MB ECC RAM
  • 1 Intel E5 Xeon CPU
  • 10 GB ZFS SSD
  • 512 GB Transfer
  • 500 Mbps Uplink
  • 1 IPv4
  • 1 /64 IPv6
  • KVM/Proxmox
  • $5.95 /quarter
  • $22.61 /year (Save additional 5%!)
  • [Order Now]
1.5GB KVM VPS

  • 1.5 GB ECC RAM
  • 2 Intel E5 Xeon CPU
  • 30 GB ZFS SSD
  • 1 TB Transfer
  • 500 Mbps Uplink
  • 1 IPv4
  • 1 /64 IPv6
  • KVM/Proxmox
  • $3.95 /month
  • $45.03 /year (Save additional 5%!)
  • [Order Now]
3GB KVM VPS

  • 3 GB ECC RAM
  • 2 Intel E5 Xeon CPU
  • 50 GB ZFS SSD
  • 2 TB Transfer
  • 500 Mbps Uplink
  • 1 IPv4
  • 1 /64 IPv6
  • KVM/Proxmox
  • Coupon: N/A
  • $5.95 /month
  • $67.83 /year (Save additional 5%!)
  • [Order Now]
